article: I was in the queue for the supermarket checkout earlier today.All of the checkouts were  _  , and the woman behind me was not happy! Every word that came from her mouth was a(n)  _  ! We can all complain; we can all react  _  , but it doesn't have to be like that.And, even if only for a few  _  , I wanted to leave that little soul with just a glimpse of another way.
